channel.title: Books on Pedro's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Books on Pedro's Blog

item.description: Books This will be a list of books I read each year. Before 2024 will be what I can remember from old books I read. Maybe in the future I can also make some critics and comments but for now we have the links and names 2024 Title Type Language Rating Harry Potter und die Kammer des Schreckens Fantasy DE-de ⭐⭐⭐ Glauben Sie an die Wahrheit Comic DE-de ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Harry Potter und der Gefangene von Azkaban- Fantasy DE-de ⭐⭐⭐ Der ZeitRaum Comic DE-de ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 1984 Comic PT-br ⭐⭐⭐⭐ Von Unten Comic DE-de/EN ⭐⭐⭐ The last Goodbye Thriller EN-en ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 2023 Title Type Language Rating Salvar o fogo Romance PT-br ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Hearthstopper Comic PT-br ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Pragmatic Programmer Comic PT-br ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 2022 Title Type Language Rating Torto Arado Romance Portuguese BR ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Fluent Python Tech English ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
